bibl.title: The Family of Aurelius Sarapion alias Dionysotheon.
bibl.note: Gives a list of documents mentioning Aurelius Sarapion alias Dionysotheon (Oxyrhynchus, 3rd century A.D.), describes their content and introduces new pieces of evidence for the family of this man.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II

bibl.seg: WARTENBERG Ute, The Family of Aurelius Sarapion alias Dionysotheon.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II (Cairo, 1992) pp. 15-22.
Gives a list of documents mentioning Aurelius Sarapion alias Dionysotheon (Oxyrhynchus, 3rd century A.D.), describes their content and introduces new pieces of evidence for the family of this man.
